alert.note: Alert for Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 10:02AM CST until February 15 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Dense fog this morning. North winds around 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Stutsman County. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 9 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Things left unsecured outside will be blown around. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of snow and blowing snow will reduce visibilities at times this afternoon and tonight.
info.instruction: If driving this morning, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Winds this afternoon and evening can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
